item.title: Every day data analysis: my mood during the first month as a data scientist consultant
item.description: 1 What was my daily mood? 2 How does my mood vary depending on the day of the week? 3 Did I fall into any thinking traps? 4 Positive and negative feelings So how did my first month as a data scientist go, I hear you ask? Well what better way to answer than by opening a bit of data. To see the all the code used in this post, visit my GitHub repository for this site
